thread.title: Khloe Kardashian sparks 'secret wedding' rumours with Tristan Thompson as they wear diamond rings after Jamaica trip
thread.title_full: Khloe Kardashian sparks 'secret wedding' rumours with Tristan Thompson as they wear diamond rings after Jamaica trip

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Khloe Kardashian sparks 'secret wedding' rumours with Tristan Thompson as they wear diamond rings after Jamaica trip
text:
Khloe Kardashian sparks 'secret wedding' rumours with Tristan Thompson as they wear diamond rings after Jamaica trip The couple enjoyed a romantic holiday to Jamaica Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Khloe Kardashian sparked rumours she might be engaged to her new boyfriend Tristan Thompson when she returned from their romantic break in Jamaica last month. 
The 32-year-old reality star flashed a huge diamond band on her ring finger – while Tristan, 25, also wore a new ring. 
The rings caused some fans to think the KUWTK star was engaged or had maybe even eloped to marry her beau in secret. 
But now a source has revealed that they're not engagement or wedding rings – but "commitment" rings. (Photo: Instagram) 
"It's actually a commitment ring," a source told Heat . 
"Khloe and Tristan didn't elope on holiday, but don't be surprised if they do really soon. 
"They had this big conversation about the future, where they talked about buying a house together, when they would get married and even how many kids they each want. (Photo: Instagram) 
"Tristan already has a son from his last relationship, and said how much he wanted Khloe to be a stepmom to his baby. 
"Khloe's been desperate for some stability after such a troubled first marriage, and Tristan is offering her a proper life and the family she's wanted for years. 
"That's why he got them the rings – to proved he's serious." 
Mirror Online have contacted Khloe's representative for comment. Khloe Kardashian and Tristan Thompson looked incredible on the beach (Photo: KhloeKardashian/Instagram) 
Last month, Khloe showed off her beach body as she soaked up the sun in Jamaica with her hot boyfriend with the impossible abs, Tristan. 
Khloe and Tristan have been dating for just over a year, and she recently called him 'The One’. 
The were holidaying on the island, and documented the trip on Instagram, posting the enviable pic of her and Tristan in the sea, and a shot of her and her ‘crew’ on the beach; Khloe, Tristan and three pals. Khloe and her crew, getting a piggy back from Tristan (Photo: KhloeKardashian/Instagram) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
